task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 34°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the target building is not visible in the current view, so I need to look up to see its full height before I can make an estimation.

Now that I can see the entire building from base to roof, I can estimate its height by counting the floors; there appear to be approximately 12 floors, and assuming a standard height of 3 meters per floor, the total height is about 36 meters.
